description.message: download web page's resource immediately as zip

tip1.message:
Click START button，the page will be refreshed by the plugin,and the resources will be detect and download.
this mode is often applied to download the pages who do not use lazyload technology

tip2.message:
Click START button,refresh the page and wait sometime,then click STOP button,the plugin will detect and download all resources in this time,and package as a zip
this mod is often applied to download the pages which uselazyload technology,or Multiple pages

tipsDetectFail.message: failed to find any resource,download fail!

pageLoadingTimeout.message: timeout for the page loading,default 30 seconds

resourceDownloadTimeout.message: timeout for the resource download,default 15 seconds
